summary: Early 2025 analyst consensus: Full-year 2025 Zepbound sales ~$10.39B, but this was conservative given Q3 2025 already hit $9.28B YTD
content:
From CNBC article (Feb 2025):
- FactSet analysts predicted Zepbound 2025 sales of $10.39 billion (more than double from 2024)
- However, Q1-Q3 2025 actual YTD was $9,281.4M, already exceeding 89% of this estimate
- Analyst consensus was too conservative
- Analysts also predicted Mounjaro 2025 sales of $18.17 billion

2024 actual Zepbound full year: ~$4,925.7M (sum of quarterly figures)
Implied Q4 2025 if $10.39B full year target: ~$1,108M (clearly too low given Q3 was $3,588M)
